Posts.Content: I can totally vouch for that, my hair has been so straight my whole life I was always envious of my sisters curls now we are like twins. I love it to be honest. I am so grateful I have hair as I know not everyone's hair does grow back.
Posts.Title: battle of the letrozole brands

Posts.Content: Hi there, there are so many different stories about Letrozole. I have been taking it for the last 9 months it has always been the same brand Accord. When I started I had pains and aches which have eased off now, just get the occassional twinges which I put down to wear and tear, I am 59 and worked as a Nurse for most of my life. I do get tired easily but that could be following the treatment radio and chemo. I would say try and persevere, there are lots of different brands which I'm sure you will read about on here from other ladies experiences. Good luck X
